Skip to contents
plus 0.0.1
  • Reference

plus model helper function

plus.Rd

plus model helper function

Usage

plus(
  x = x,
  y = y,
  alpha = 1,
  sample_use_time = 30,
  learning_rate = 1,
  qq = 0.1
)

Arguments

x

A set of independent numeric variables.

y

A binary dependent variable

alpha

The elastic net mixing parameter, with \(0\le\alpha\le 1\). (See glmnet)

sample_use_time

Number of use time

learning_rate

learning rate

qq

quantile threshold

Value

and object of the class plus

Examples

data(binexample)
x = binexample$x
y = binexample$y
plus(x, y)
